10 Things to do on your Mauritius Honeymoon 
Beach lovers’ first choice for a honeymoon destination is Mauritius. Mauritius is a beautiful island country which has featured in dreams of exotic honeymoons for couples from all over the world. The silver soft sands, the turquoise waters of the Indian Ocean, the beautiful eco friendly villas right in the middle of the sea, the delectable food, the exciting adventures, tropical weather and the pleasant experience of the breathtaking place. 
As Indian enjoys Visa on Arrival, it’s very easy to travel to the nation. From air tickets, hotel & accommodation, holiday packages & travel arrangements make travel plans for your memorable trip. Here is our list of 10 Things to do on your honeymoon holiday in Mauritius Heavenly Beaches 
The beaches of the Island are beautiful beyond words. The most popular ones are Grand Bay, Belle Mare, Pereybere and Blue Bay. Walk on the soft sands holding hands of your love. Watch the sunset and ambiance turn into a romantic one. 
Read more: 5 Steady Yoga And Meditation Centre in India Scenic Drives 
Mauritius has an extensive motorway and widespread coastal roads which can be best enjoyed during long rides on your rented vehicle as you go on scenic through sugarcane plantations, cities and markets. Go shopping 
Enjoy shopping on this exotic island at reasonable prices, quality products and amazing range. Some attractive places for shopping are the Grand Baie Bazar, Quatre Bornes and Goodlands. The islands have pretty beachwear, sea shell jewelry and other knick knacks available at decent bargains. Food Indulgence 
Mauritius offers a unique mix of pleasures of Sea, Creole, African, Indian and international tastes. Enjoy street food or elegant dining. The flavors, the setting and the experience are a cherished holiday delight. 
Read more: Choose a Perfect Beach in Goa, India Chamarel Village 
The little village of Chamarel is home to the Seven Colored Earth and the highest waterfall in Mauritius. It’s beautiful and quite romantic to explore. Ile aux Cerfs 
Ile aux Cerf’s, Mauritius is known as the Treasure Island. Mauritius honeymoon packages are complete when you have explored the blessed wonderful white sandy beaches and azure waters, the charming getaway is perfect for a romantic experience. Relish Mauritian Spas 
Relish a Mauritian spa treatment on your holiday. Indulge in a mix of Indian, African, Chinese and European therapeutic spas. Pamplemousses Botanical Garden 
Enjoy a Scenic Treat at Pamplemousses Botanical Garden home to more than 85 varieties of palm trees and other flora. A walk with your loved one takes you amidst greenery; the fish ponds laid beautifully and tropical beauty. 
Read more: Top 10 Beach Resort in Kerala for Luxury holiday Grand Bassin 
The breathtaking beautiful Grand basin lake is considered as a sacred lake as per Hindu beliefs. It’s a wonder created by a crater and the sight is spectacular. Sky dive 
Mauritius hosts various extreme sports. Sky diving is the greatest of adventure to be tried here. A jump from 10,000 ft from airplane is a rush of adrenalin which is not just for the weak hearted. From the sky, water, underwater to all sorts of adventures you have lost of options to have a good time. Sky diving, scuba diving, snorkeling, jet skiing are some other adventures.
